mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(a.count * (b.price + d.addprice)), 0) AS totalUsedAmount FROM order_menu a LEFT JOIN menu b ON a.menuId = b.menuId LEFT JOIN order_menu_option c ON a.orderMenuId = c.orderMenuId LEFT JOIN menu_option d ON c.menuOptionId = d.menuOptionId LEFT JOIN `order` e ON e.orderId = a.orderId WHERE e.createdAt BETWEEN #{firstDayOfMonth} AND '${today} 23:59:59' AND e.userId = #{userId} AND e.orderProgress = 3
